item.title: I Think I've Figured Out The Perfect Way For The DC Universe's Batman To Be Completely Different To Other Dark Knight Movies And Still Be Comics-Accurate
item.description: There is one comic-accurate aspect of Batman that I think the DCU could capitalize on to ensure its version of the Dark Knight is decidedly unique.

item.title: How A 2022 Horror Prequel With 77% Audience RT Score Led To Romantic Drama Movie Casting
item.description: Exclusive: Julia Stiles and Isabelle Fuhrman explain how their work on a well-received horror prequel led to the cast of their romantic drama movie.

item.title: Haymitch's Hunger Games Prequel Is Officially Continuing The Franchise's Smartest Romance Trend
item.description: Haymitch’s Hunger Games prequel will continue the franchise’s clever romance trend, though Sunrise on the Reaping may need to get creative with it.
